_comment: Holds mapping for each role with and its associated dashboards

roles._comment: This is the Admin role who sees mostly all the dashboards

dashboards.name: Source Content Report
dashboards.description: Report which shows the sources who have been uploading the content and the Content Types.

dashboards.name: Source Status Report
dashboards.description: Report which shows the sources who have been uploading the content and the Status of those content.

dashboards.name: Competency Source Status Report
dashboards.description: Report of Competencies created and the statuses of them

dashboards.name: Source Category Report
dashboards.description: Report which shows the sources who have been uploading the content and the category of those content.

dashboards.name: Department Wise User Report
dashboards.description: Report which gives the number of users available on the platform from different departments.
